EmailTemplate.subject: Urgent: Action Required for Your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} Case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Customer.FirstName},
We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to follow up regarding your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case, for which you previously signed our retainer agreement. Unfortunately, our prosecuting firm has been unsuccessful in reaching you, and it is essential that you contact them promptly if you wish to proceed with the possibility of obtaining a settlement. To move forward with your case, we kindly request that you reach out to CSS (Childers Schlueter & Smith) at 800-641-0098. Their team needs to speak with you to discuss further steps in pursuing your case.
If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at Young & Partners Law Firm by calling 888-427-9607 as well. Thank you.
All the best, Young & Partners Law Firm 888-427-9607
